item.description:
Do you remember feeling heartbroken as a kid? Do you remember the one that got away? Did you ever have something to tell someone that you were afraid would break their heart? Did your family change when another child was born?

Come hear storytellers Jannelle Codianni, Brendyn Schneider, Katie Liesener, and Owen Grey tell tales of their broken hearts.

When? August 15th, 2012, 7:00pm - 9:30pm
Where? The Lilypad, Inman Square, 1353 Cambridge St., Cambridge, MA

Tickets: $8+fee standing; $10+fee seated.
http://heartbreak815.eventbrite.com/

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Heartbreak: A Night of Storytelling
